item.title: Magento 2 Module Development withÂ Pestle
item.description: Magento 2 has a wide range of tools that help you with developing modules. One of the well-known CLI tools in Magento is Magerun. This is an extension of Magento’s own CLI tool that already comes out of the box when you install Magento 2. One of my favorite tools that I use a lot is Pestle by Alan Storm. Since much of our code we write mainly consists of template (reusable) code, Pestle helps to generate a lot of this code.
